formalpara.title: Figure 7. Structure of the C. elegans LAG-1/LIN-12/SEL-8 ternary complex structure bound to DNA.
formalpara.para: Ribbon diagram of the CSL-NICD-MAM ternary complex from C. elegans (PDB ID: 2FO1). CSL (LAG-1) and DNA are colored as in Figure 6. The RAM and ANK domains of NICD (LIN-12) are colored red and blue, respectively. MAM (SEL-8) is colored grey.
